page.title: 03Penrith: Auction Mart
page.content: Penrith Mart has been on its present site for over a hundred years. it is a busy and flourshing mart owned by Penrith Farmers and Kidds. It is a noted North of England Market for the sale of well-bred dairy cattle. The weekly sales (Tuesday) have a very good selection of newly calved friesian cows and Heifers from local farms and all from full Brucellosis Accredited Herds. The mart also has annual sales of breeding sheep which are amongst the largest in the country. The autumn lamb sales also include local breeds off the Lakeland Fells, and the Pennines. Some of the farmers that attend todays marts are third and fourth generation farmers. Thoes that are buying or selling stand around the selling ring, but on the benches around the ring are the retired farmers.
